item.title: PayPal taps wallets from China and India to make cross-border payments easier for 2 billion people
item.description: PayPal is partnering with global fintech companies to let users pay to different wallet systems cross border.

item.title: A Top NASA Official Is Among Thousands of Staff Leaving the Agency
item.description: Makenzie Lystrup’s departure from NASA’s Goddard Space Flight Center comes soon after the resignation of the director of JPL.

item.title: Apple alerted Iranians to iPhone spyware attacks, say researchers
item.description: Researchers say Apple sent out threat notifications to several Iranians in recent months, saying their iPhones had been hacked. Iran is likely behind ...

item.title: Amazon acquires Bee, the AI wearable that records everything you say
item.description: Amazon has acquired the AI wearables startup Bee, which makes a bracelet and an Apple Watch app that record your day-to-day life to function as an AI ...

item.title: OpenAI agreed to pay Oracle $30B a year for data center services
item.description: OpenAI was the customer that signed the huge deal that Oracle disclosed last month.
